Description:
Perform nail repairs and maintenance, such as filling, buffing, and applying top coats.
Ensure proper sanitization and sterilization of tools, equipment, and workstations.
Educate clients on nail care, proper hygiene, and recommended products for maintaining healthy nails.
Stay updated on the latest trends, techniques, and products in the nail industry.
Provide exceptional customer service and address client concerns or requests.
Maintain a clean and organized work environment.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a Nail Technician or in a similar role.
Must Have Visa 18.
In-depth knowledge of nail care techniques, products, and trends.
Proficiency in performing manicures, pedicures, and nail enhancements.
Strong artistic and creative skills for nail art and design.
Excellent hand-eye coordination and attention to detail.
Knowledge of health and safety regulations related to nail care.
Good communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.
Professional appearance and demeanor.
Certification or training from a recognized nail technician program is preferred.
